directions: In a medium bowl, cream together the margarine, eggs and confectioners' sugar; beat for 15 minutes.  Spread evenly in the graham cracker crusts.

In each crust, place banana slices on top of sugar mixture; spread pineapple on bananas.  Spoon a little of the reserved juice over fruit.  Spoon whipped topping over fruit; garnish with cherries and pecans.  Chill before serving.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained with juice reserved
1 (16 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Banana Split Pie
